languages.text: "Навигаторы, зрящие золотой свет сквозь тьму и безумие, не должны быть подвержены распрям! Величие их миссии должно беречь от низменных порывов, разве не так?"

"Discord cannot be allowed to take root among the Navigators, who perceive the golden light through the veil of darkness and insanity! Their grand mission must surely inoculate them against such base impulses, must it not?"
languages.original_text: "Навигаторы, зрящие золотой свет сквозь тьму и безумие, не должны быть подвержены распрям! Величие их миссии должно беречь от низменных порывов, разве не так?"

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “绝不能放任导航者之间产生分歧。他们承担着伟大的使命，他们需要透过黑暗与疯狂的面纱，凝视着帝皇的明光！这一定会让他们抵抗住卑鄙的冲动，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: "Discord cannot be allowed to take root among the Navigators, who perceive the golden light through the veil of darkness and insanity! Their grand mission must surely inoculate them against such base impulses, must it not?"

traits.locale_text: “绝不能放任导航者之间产生分歧。他们承担着伟大的使命，他们需要透过黑暗与疯狂的面纱，凝视着帝皇的明光！这一定会让他们抵抗住卑鄙的冲动，不是吗？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Comment les navigateurs, ceux-là mêmes qui perçoivent la lumière dorée à travers le voile des ténèbres et de la folie, pourraient-ils sombrer dans la discorde ?! Leur mission ne devrait-elle pas justement les rendre insensibles à de telles pulsions ? »
languages.original_text: "Discord cannot be allowed to take root among the Navigators, who perceive the golden light through the veil of darkness and insanity! Their grand mission must surely inoculate them against such base impulses, must it not?"

traits.locale_text: « Comment les navigateurs, ceux-là mêmes qui perçoivent la lumière dorée à travers le voile des ténèbres et de la folie, pourraient-ils sombrer dans la discorde ?! Leur mission ne devrait-elle pas justement les rendre insensibles à de telles pulsions ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡No podemos dejar que la discordia arraigue entre los Navegantes, que perciben la luz dorada a través del velo de oscuridad y locura! Su grandiosa misión debería inocularles contra estos impulsos tan básicos, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "Discord cannot be allowed to take root among the Navigators, who perceive the golden light through the veil of darkness and insanity! Their grand mission must surely inoculate them against such base impulses, must it not?"

traits.locale_text: «¡No podemos dejar que la discordia arraigue entre los Navegantes, que perciben la luz dorada a través del velo de oscuridad y locura! Su grandiosa misión debería inocularles contra estos impulsos tan básicos, ¿no?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「暗闇と狂気のヴェールから黄金の光を認識できる航宙士同士のいざこざなど、あってはならない！彼らの壮大な使命は、そんな衝動なんかを超越するものなのだから」
languages.original_text: "Discord cannot be allowed to take root among the Navigators, who perceive the golden light through the veil of darkness and insanity! Their grand mission must surely inoculate them against such base impulses, must it not?"

traits.locale_text: 「航宙士同士の不仲が当たり前になることなど、あってはならない。暗闇と狂気のヴェールから黄金の光を認識できる者なのだから！そんな基本的衝動を防ぐよう、偉大な聖務を刻み込んでやらなくてはならない、違うか？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Zwietracht darf keine Wurzeln unter den Navigatoren schlagen, die das goldene Licht durch den Schleier von Dunkelheit und Wahnsinn wahrnehmen! Ihre große Mission impft sie doch gewiss gegen solch niedere Impulse, will ich meinen?"
languages.original_text: "Discord cannot be allowed to take root among the Navigators, who perceive the golden light through the veil of darkness and insanity! Their grand mission must surely inoculate them against such base impulses, must it not?"

traits.locale_text: "Zwietracht darf keine Wurzeln unter den Navigatoren schlagen, die das goldene Licht durch den Schleier von Dunkelheit und Wahnsinn wahrnehmen! Ihre große Mission impft sie doch gewiss gegen solch niedere Impulse, will ich meinen?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Discord cannot be allowed to take root among the Navigators, who perceive the golden light through the veil of darkness and insanity! Their grand mission must surely inoculate them against such base impulses, must it not?"

languages.text: "Karanlık ve delilik örtüsünün ardındaki altın ışığı gören Rotacılar arasında ihtilafın kök salmasına müsaade edilemez! Büyük vazifeleri, böylesi rezil dürtülere kulak asmamalarını sağlamalı, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Discord cannot be allowed to take root among the Navigators, who perceive the golden light through the veil of darkness and insanity! Their grand mission must surely inoculate them against such base impulses, must it not?"

traits.locale_text: "Karanlık ve delilik örtüsünün ardındaki altın ışığı gören Rotacılar arasında ihtilafın kök salmasına müsaade edilemez! Büyük vazifeleri, böylesi rezil dürtülere kulak asmamalarını sağlamalı, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
